website_summaries.verdict: For a middle-of-the-road price, the Chicco NextFit is a strong anchor and a reliable product with a few known peculiarities.
pros: Deep head-wings lined with EPS foam protect from side impact, and a removable infant insert provides even more protection
cons: Some owners report disappointment that the cup holder cannot accommodate a 12-ounce sippy cup

customer_reviews.title: My car was totalled, the seat was not.
customer_reviews.text: Thank God my daughter was not in the car at the time. However I was hit on my driver side by someone doing 70 and caved in the both of the driver side doors. This sit didnt move, held up with the massive impact and airbags deploying. I will forever be a loyal customer to all Chicco products. Had my daughter been in this seat, I know it would have saved her life. My car was totalled out and the seat straps were cut at the junk yard they towed my car to after.
customer_reviews.author: SocialCynja

customer_reviews.title: Great when it fits. Not good for even a large sedan like the Ford Fusion.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my Subaru Forrester. But it does NOT work well for my husband's Ford Fusion. As others have mentioned, this thing has monster high sidewalls. If your car has a small door opening (which honestly I didn't think the Fusion had), you might want to look at a Britax. Also, I've noticed with my husband's smaller car, it is harder to loosen the shoulder straps. No issues in my car though. Plus, that won't be an issue once it is time to do forward-facing. Very easy to install. We're talking like two minutes, tops.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car seat and he is not a car seat person at all! We upgraded to this seat once he turned 13 months and was growing out of the infant one...I love that it reclines and that it is washable. Only thing the fabric easily pulls so we have a few loose end feabrics sticking out but other than that, I love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Great seat,  besides one detail
customer_reviews.text: So we absolutely LOVEed the seat until this happened... the next fit MAX doesn't have this. Now I certainly have a criteria when I choose the seat. I'm still going with this brand, but I will choose the MAX model. I emailed the company. Hope no one else experience this.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Sireaeva Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install + comfort + safety
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!! If you can spring for the price difference, do it! We had a Graco 4in1 previously. It was nice but this Chicco is the Cadillac of car seats! Over all easy to install, my son looks super comfortable --I love the crotch strap cover...softer against legs when wearing shorts! Great material. Looking forward to being able to unzip and wash it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany P.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat - skip the extra air flow bit.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second car seat for our third child, replacing our much loved infant car seat. Overall, I’m extremely pleased. It was extremely easy to install, and easy to adjust as needed. I never have issues putting my baby into the higher sides of the car seat, and love that the straps don’t get tangled. The only reason I took off a star is because the “additional air flow” that made it cost an extra hundred dollars makes absolutely no difference in our Arizona heat. My child winds up just as sweaty as she did in her other seat, and is just as sweaty as our other kids.
customer_reviews.author: SGilbert

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is great quality and my daughter is comfortable in it. We recently got rear ended and thank goodness my baby girl was strapped into this car seat. She was a little scared from the noise but perfectly secure in the car seat. The only thing I would say is that it’s a little large, but no matter since my daughter is comfortable and safe. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Favorite CarSeat
customer_reviews.text: Chicco Nextfit is my favorite carseat! I've used this seat with all 3 of my children. From newborn to almost 6 years old! The only cons I have for this seat is it is very difficult to fit 3 across because it is so wide. Also it is a rather heavy seat if you plan to be moving it from car to car.
customer_reviews.author: Lallah Reviews

customer_reviews.title: paid the extra money for all the additional features but not impressed with them.
customer_reviews.text: we got it for the reason it reclines and was the air so his back wouldn't get all sweaty but his back still gets super sweaty to where his shirt is damp from it and the recliner handle is so far down you can't adjust it without undoing the whole car seat. however it does come with a lot of cushion so that's good but not what we expected when paying so much for the car seat for extra features
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: 2019 model became a cheap version for same amount of money
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat. BUT I just purchased a second one for my second child and was very disappointed to see that chicco made this carseat cheaper than its older version but the price is the same. There is no Comfort Flex cover on this model anymore which was 60% of the reason I bought this model. So now to have the same level of comfort for my child I would have to go to chicco nextfit zip air which is over $300. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: D.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help keep your baby cool at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to help keep my boy cool. Cool air technology is a sham and doesn't work at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. However, we got the zip air because my sons back always gets so sweaty. It doesn’t seem to make much of a difference for the extra amount that you spend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to Tighten Straps (All)
customer_reviews.text: My wife picked this carseat which means i install it and handle many of the child in, child out, duties. This carseat is safe and fits well, but functionally, I cannot stand it. The strap at the base to tighten the body straps is cumbersome to pull and tighten on the child. This should be easy as the angle is awkward. Tightening the anchor straps is not easy and the carseat always seems to wobble more than you would prefer. It works and the price is less but This carseat frustrates me every time I use it. Which is only every day of my life. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Its a tank but my babe loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carseat, super comfy for my babe. Its pretty heavy and not ideal to switch it from car to car but you can't have everything. FYI-this carseat is only made for latch hooks, it will not fastening securely with shoulder belt. We learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Mel123

customer_reviews.title: Best Car seat EVER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this car seat. Took me less than 5 minutes to take to my car and install it. Super comfortable for my girl and once installed doesn’t move or budge at all. I couldn’t have picked a better car seat
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marr

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Car seat
customer_reviews.text: We have owned a lot of car seats over the years and no one beats the Chicco’s patented design for tightening (except maybe the Clicktight which is also pretty great.) We have 2 Nextfits and they are so easy to get in right and level. Material is super soft and lots of recline options so great for car nappers and preserving front to back space to make room for adults legs in the front seat. My only complaint is how wide it is. You definitely would never fit three of these across. Chicco- make one of these exact seats but slimmer for baby #3!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: My favorite carseat I've ever used. Usually I get random stuff second-hand but after getting a little extra pocket money I decided to get the best reviewed carseat on here regardless of price. Was not disappointed! Do not know how we functioned without this before. While I miss the multiple bases of the infant chicco so moving the seat car to car was easier, it's been livable without. Baby loves it, she seems mega comfortable. She even climbs into it just as a seat for fun if we have it sitting on the floor in the house. Happy that we'll get to use this one for a few years
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Safe
customer_reviews.text: Minimal hassle and minimal materials with optimum safety. My husband has this carseat in his car and I have a Britax. Though I like my Britax as well, the Chicco has less unnecessary "stuff" than the Britax (no extra shock absorbers, shoulder pads, etc) but still feels very secure. I find the straps are easier to manipulate with the Chicco vs. the Britax as well.
customer_reviews.author: drkassy

customer_reviews.title: Better than Britax
customer_reviews.text: These car seats are super easy to install when you have the anchors in your car. The seatbelt installation can be a little more difficult. Especially if you have big hands. They are very roomy. The new chest clip is great. We have an older version and our two year old is able to unclip it if he wants to. :-/ The button to release the straps is really easy to get to and overall this is our favorite car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best
customer_reviews.text: I Cant say enough about this carseat. I even went to buy buy baby to compare a few seats in person and this one took the cake. I liked the colors of the maxi cosi but it isn't steel framed and the padding on rhe chicco was by far more compfy and plush. Britax had 2 I wanted to see in person as well , they are pretty close in safety specs but again the chicco seemed way more comfy. I love that my child seems like he sits IN the seat rather than on the seat. He is totally protected ♡
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this seat!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST CAR SEAT EVER! This is our 2nd one to purchase. I recommend this seat to anyone who is transitioning from an infant seat to convertible car seat. What I love most about it: EASY TO INSTALL! This seat installs so easily - it’s easy pull straps get this seat so crazy tight with very little pulling effort. Next fav feature is how easy it is to loosen/tighten straps. I don’t feel like I have to pull so hard on the strap that I might accidentally slip and hit my kiddo in the face! Lastly, it’s a super comfortable seat! My kiddo loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Adams

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely live the Chicco brand. It is all we have used for both babies. So easy to install using the Latch system in my 2016 Dodge Charger. Very comfy for my 9 month old (she outgrew length wise for her Chicco KeyFit). Will forever love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Cooling pads hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: We were bought this seat less than a year ago and chicco has replaced it 2x first straps wouldnt loosen then the zipper messed up now the latch with the yellow button doesnt click will be going with a different brand in the future as far as the cooling pad its nice it keeps my son cool but when he got carsick we had to wash it 4x and still the air pockets didnt come completely clean if your child gets car sick or spits up i don't recommend this seat
customer_reviews.author: Audrea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s one time good investment for high brand car seat. It’s my second purchase from chicco. Previously I used chicco Trio Travel system for my infant and no issues till date. Sturdy, durability, light weight, good quality, smart look makes it best. I’ll recommend my other friends if they are looking for good car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Suman

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very protective seat that should be useful for years. The only negative is difficulty strapping a child into it. Latches are not easy for anyone with arthritis, and padding often gets in the way of making connections. Child restraint belts are not easily adjusted either. With a patient child, it’s fine, but I’d be concerned if we had a real wriggler.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My twins are 10 months and one kid is quite large and has already had to size up. This thing is expensive but it’s worth it. The other seats feel flimsy or too large for him. This one feels protective but just the next size up. Works great and is easy to install without a million pieces. To do over again I’d just get this and skip the infant seat but we were expecting premies. The only possible down size is that the distance between the crotch strap and the back is pretty limited even on the expanded setting. But it’s more distance than most seats.
customer_reviews.author: SK253

customer_reviews.title: Great seats overall
customer_reviews.text: No major complaints, seems safe and well built. They are pretty heavy for a car seat and wider/taller. Plenty of angles they can be adjusted to, just park in a flat area to level properly. The back seat of a sedan with two of these would be a tight fit for a middle passenger. Depending on the car of course, I have a mid/full size sedan. But I don’t believe a larger adult would fit. Possibly a small booster seat, child or smaller adult. Simple installation it’ll just take a little extra time if you use all anchors. Getting seatbelt buckled can be a pain if you’re not patient.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Seat is a pain in the hind quarters to swap between vehicles if you don't have built in anchors
customer_reviews.text: I drive a pickup truck that doesn't have car seat anchors in the back, so every time my wife and I wanted to swap this unit into my truck, it was a 20 minute exercise. They need to redesign the car seat mounting for non anchored vehicle seats. The problem is you have to take the car seat cover off to weave the vehicle seat belt through the mounting point. There are better designs out there that do not command the top dollar as this car seat does. Unfortunately my wife insists on buying this brand, and as a result, we bought "his" and "hers" car seats to keep in our vehicles to save ourselves the nuisance of swapping.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Nalgonas

customer_reviews.title: Is Perfect, secure is the correct word.
customer_reviews.text: This one is super comfortable car seat and made with long lasting materials, my baby loves seat in.
customer_reviews.author: Caro Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: It's a Chicco, what else can I say?
customer_reviews.text: We are pretty loyal to European brands for carseats as they seem to be better quality, and this one is no different. Very sturdy and has a good visual system for proper positioning with different reclining positions. We switched my son out of an infant carrier to this carseat around 7 months and now car rides are much happier! Roomy and comfortable for my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Petersen

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Looked long and hard for a car seat that met all my needs. I drive a Ford Fusion and need 2 car seats so space is very limited. This fits perfectly behind the driver and passenger seats and babies can fully recline. Very comfy for baby and easy to clean. Was the easiest car seat I’ve ever installed and fits VERY snug. No movement whatsoever. Total peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: melissa brooks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is the easiest one I’ve ever had to install...EVER! you literally just clip it onto your seat and pull the straps to secure it in place. It reclines which makes it great for sleepy baby so their heads don’t fall forward. I loved this so much I have two - one for my 10 mo and the other for my 2 yo.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Super Quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband whom is an engineer did his homework on every car seat out there and after weeks of research this is the one he went with. It's very heavy but extremely safe and well made. It's not a seat you will move from one car to another being that it is so heavy and it's work to set up. I feel very safe that out granddaughter will be safe in this seat. A+
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Young

customer_reviews.title: Hard af to install but looks like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Oh man did I swear up and down trying to install this beast. For the life of me I could not get it tight enough. The secret is you need to unzip the cover and pull the straps through the bottom and tighten that way. But you need to do each side at a time so you can zip the bottom of the cover closed before it gets too tight. I struggled for over an hour and that’s the only way I could figure out how to get the straps tight enough. Other than that, it looks great! Good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I've purchased, one for my car, my spouses car and now for my mom's car. Super easy to install, versatile for various sizes of kiddo (especially helpful for Grandma with different aged grandchildren). It's a little bit of a struggle to remove the cover for cleaning but not the end of the world. The straps and attachments are all easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: M.w.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly but took some getting used to for my son. The cup holder is a bit further reach for his little arms, so he is sometimes more independent in the other seat he uses frequently in my husbands car. The reach for me from drivers seat to behind me is also impossible; this seat is bulkier than others. Overall, it fits him well which is more important, and feels/looks very protective should the worse happen. Also, My son is very messy with snacks so we have to shake this out and/or clean it once every week or two to avoid too much build up.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install using the latch system and seems like it'll grow with her. The straps weren't the most intuitive thing in the world to figure out so I had to refer to the manual. Looks good and the build quality also seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: mnoble

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I had read this product is a great product. Purchased it during Prime days on Amazon, Received today and it was manufactured over a year ago! Therefore expiration for using it will happen 1 year prior than if it were produced in this year. Sending it back and very disappointed in Amazon as I could have purchased this car seat elsewhere for a bit more than on this site and been a current year. Have missed out on that now.
customer_reviews.author: Downeasta

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, perfect fit for a small car
customer_reviews.text: this car seat is awesome! It is super easy to install, and it fits perfectly into my wife's Fiat 500 (which is a very small car). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seat for newborns to toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our new baby born in September. Its now Nov and its still great. My 3 yo has been in hers since she was 4 months old and this is by far the best seat. Easy to clean and easy to install tightly. I never wonder it its secure and as they grow its easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Buy this car seat!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a Grace Extended fit, but with that carseat my son was sitting to upright when rear facing to be comfortable and his head when fall forward when asleep. Changed to the Chico Nextfit.... love it!!!! It reclines more like a carrier/ bucket car seat and is supper easy to install. Would buy this seat again:)
customer_reviews.author: Erin J.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the previous Nextfit Zip for my first born and loved it! When my second was born I knew that I wanted another one. He sweats A LOT! I was really excited to find a seat that was more breathable. He still gets sweaty but not nearly as bad as he did in our infant seat.
customer_reviews.author: bouldershade

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeds our expectations!
customer_reviews.text: We cannot say enough about this car seat!! Hands down the Best!! Our little traveller is just under a year and we have made a 10hr trip with her for the 3rd time. Previously we really struggled! But this time it was a dream! So comfortable, her head is supported well, and she just feels secured! Thank you Chicco!! You made our lives 200% easier when travelling!!
customer_reviews.author: M Kurten

customer_reviews.title: I looked at them all questioning which one best for the best price. I ended up with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Graco 4-1 and couldn’t get it right it slid side to side. So I returned it to order this one after reading all the reviews. It’s smaller than the 4-1 but it was super easy to Putin and tighten. And I also liked that the leg area has material to keep straps from cutting into their legs. It’s nice and very glad I spent the little extra money. I was hoping to get a nice one for less but just buy it, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tall
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to install as I hoped. I have britax and graco, and britax is by far the easiest. I have a Nissan Rogue and the baby seat is so high, that I have to really hoist her up to get her in it. I’m 5’3 and didnt have this issue with the other car seats. Wish I would have purchased another Graco or Britax but it’s too late.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: BEST convertible car seat around
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t cleaned it yet so I can’t really answer that but I do have a friend who has this same model and she is always saying how easy it is to clean. This worked out prefect for us. I order it for our 5 month old who had a Britax infant seat but it was very narrow and well my child isn’t narrow so we need some more room with the same safety level as the other seat we had. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jerad j.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to use and grow with
customer_reviews.text: Researched convertible carseats for months and am very glad I chose the Chico Nextfit Zip. Only gripe is that there is no place to pull back the straps when putting baby into the seat. Solved that problem by buying clip on magnets by Munchkin and now the seat is perfect to me!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha T

customer_reviews.title: Protective and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My baby seems much more comfortable in this than his newborn carrier car seat! It was fairly easy to install and it seems very protective.
customer_reviews.author: SSHckh

customer_reviews.title: best carseats on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Chicco carsearts are absolutely the best on the market in my opinion. by far the easiest to install and clean and the only ones my kids will sleep in because they rarely ever sleep in the car! i fully recommend!
customer_reviews.author: isomdc

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Heavy; Hard to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old when she outgrew her Fit2, an infant bucket for birth to 2. I wish I hadn't bought this. It's better for birth to 2, I think. It's bulky. It's hard to clean despite the zipper. I care about this because she's potty trained, but I don't trust her in the car yet. It won't be easy to remove the car seat to clean. I prefer the Britax seats I bought for my older kids.
customer_reviews.author: EC Mama

customer_reviews.title: THE car seat. Chicco does it again!
customer_reviews.text: We loved our Chicco key fit. But to save a little $ We tried graco and our girl hated it. Literally we couldn’t get out of our neighborhood and she’d be uncomfortable. Thus we were uncomfortable. Bought this in hopes it would match the same quality standards of the keyfit and it’s an absolute home run
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Best convertible car seat!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to transition our son to a big boy car seat from the infant carrier. We had a long trip coming up and wanted to give him a more comfortable ride. Easy to install. Style is nice, I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amelia approves ✅
customer_reviews.text: My 9month old baby girl absolutely loves her new big girl car seat! Thank you chicco, for making an amazing/safety /fashionable car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to buckle, but my son hates it?
customer_reviews.text: Overall I thought it it installed easily, and easy to buckle. I thought it fit comfortably on my son, but my son screams a lot in car seats in general- and this was no exception. In addition, I did find that his back was sweating (once) though the ac was on. So overall - I think it's a good purchase if you don't have a child that hates car seats with his/her life.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cheuk

customer_reviews.title: Love Chico!
customer_reviews.text: We moved from a keyfit to this and we love it I was a little disappointed that they changed the chest clip because i have trouble gripping stuff but I don’t have any trouble at all with it! It was supper easy to put into my car as well!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke D.

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Overall the seat gives an impression of sturdiness and comfort. Install was a breeze with the latch system and built in levels. Dislikes: The chicco nextfit is good, but not as easy to use as the infant carrier. It’s challenging to get my child in the seat, and the buckle is flimsier and harder to use than the infant carrier.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Returned, loose install, zipper quality lacking
customer_reviews.text: I returned this seat because I could not get a tight install. Also, the zipper was very hard to zip and unzip. I don’t see it lasting over time.
customer_reviews.author: mommy2030

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this carseat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! It seems bulky but it fit perfectly in the back of my commuter which is a Ford Fusion. Super easy to install. Love all the reclining settings so it can be reclined all the way back when they are infants. My daughter is 18 months, obviously still rear facing and has plenty of space between her feet and the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wow great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this car seat!!! I don’t know what else to say it’s so compact yet so roomy for my daughter. I wish I had purchased this for my first! As my second is my last baby!!! If you are debating on car seats this is by far the best! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car seat because it was the highest rated along with Britax. We have an infant Britax seat but our 1 year old had outgrown it so we bought this one. Both brands are the highest in safety rating but my goodness what a difference in comfort! This car seat reclines well and is so comfortable and made of high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more pleased with the chicco brand car seats. They are easy to install, the snaps are great. They have a nice sleek look to them. I haven’t had an accident but I feel confident that this carseat would keep my baby safe
customer_reviews.author: Celestia H

customer_reviews.title: Great, but Bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 2016 grand Cherokee. However, the sides of the seat are very bulky and can make it difficult to put my son in. I have to reach pretty far in to get him into the seat. Other than that, I have no complaints ! Arrived super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Long Term Safety Seat
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit taken back by the price tag, as this was a requested gift. However, upon delivery I was able to discern that it covers babes from birth through the booster seat phase. So rationalizing the cost and spreading it out over the years, the cost is somewhat recoverable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best One Yet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and user friendly! Bought a second one and gave away Graco Slim Fit. My son was way more comfortable in this seat for some reason. Better installing, nice straps, and zippered cover is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B. Juntunen

customer_reviews.title: Not easily used.
customer_reviews.text: Cumbersome to place child in and out of. This car seat is bulky and not easy to place your child into. It is not easily installed and this one lasted about 2 months before my wife was begging for a different car seat. Use your money on a better car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Yes Yes YES!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh do I love this seat! So easy to install, so easy to loosen\tighten the straps when I am trying to remove baby. I originally had a different car seat but felt like I had to put my whole weight behind trying to loosen the straps, I returned that old one for this one and let me tell you, it moves like butta. Baby also seems very comfortable in it, which is a plus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy

customer_reviews.title: Good carseats
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 for grandparents car. They are more difficult to install compared to our more Nuna Rava carseats but they work well for the occasional visits and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long. This is the only carseat I will ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat!!! It is super easy to install and very comfortable for my 15 month old son. The very first use he spilled all kinds of milk in it and I quickly unzipped it and threw it in the wash!!! Love Love Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Best seat ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Best seat I’ve ever had and I’ve been through a few. SO easy to install and seems super comfortable. Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We shopped for a long time for a toddler car seat. We decided to stay with Chicco, great safety ratings, comfort is awesome for little one. Sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mauldin

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat for the money
customer_reviews.text: I think it's pretty comfortable for my daughter. it took some getting used to for her I think she missed her old car seat. I wish it reclined just one more click just to get her used to it a little more because the first angle is just a little high. Overall amazing car seat.
customer_reviews.author: brennan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 16mos outgrew her baby carseat and cries each time we tried to put her in it. I could not stand it anymore, I researched the most comfortable car seat and we settled for this. She is happy with her seat and is very comfortable during each trip. It meets every description. Irrespective of the cost, I would recommend, my child's comfort is a priority
customer_reviews.author: uri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for days for what I felt would be the best, safest and most comfortable car seat for my daughter while not being to bulky. I am so happy I chose Chico, the quality is amazing and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is sooo nice and easy to install. It is also extremely easy to adjust when your baby gets bigger. I would highly recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Zacharko

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but it is really big.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BIG but it seems to be really safe. No problems yet! Very happy with our purchase. We did a lot of research and this one was the only one without a ton of awful reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hotz

customer_reviews.title: Big and looks very protective
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so for now I can just say that it was super easy to instal and it looks very sturdy and safe! Although it’s not that easy to latch it, I also have a graco which is much easier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son seems comfortable and safe.
customer_reviews.text: I like that he can stay rear facing and his legs can remain straight. He’s 1 so technically he can turn around but the Peds recommend rear facing until he’s two. He’ll be 18 months in April. I’m very happy with this purchase and feel less anxious then when he was in his infant seat. He still qualifies for it because he’s still within the weight range but doesn’t seem as comfortable or protected.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Won’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat! In my opinion chicco is the way to go! We have been pleased ever since we started with chicco in the infant car seats! Never disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd & 4th one!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this carseat! I've been using these seats for almost 4 years and it looked almost new. It is really easy to install; I love the padding in it, it seems much more supportive than other car seats; it's easy to zip off and machine wash; most importantly, IT WORKS! I was rear ended and this car seat kept both of my babies safe. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sharkey724

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice car seat have only had it since July 2018 and it is Dec 31 2018. My son was 18 months old when purchased. Easy to install. Can get dirty easy if you let your kid eat in the car but what car seat doesn’t get dirty? Easy enough to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Korth

customer_reviews.title: Chicco is solid
customer_reviews.text: We started with the chicco infant seat and weren’t happy when we tried Graco. Chicco is just the way to go for ease of use and installation.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Borchardt

customer_reviews.title: Best reclining options for head and neck support
customer_reviews.text: This has the best reclining options, although I will say in my Yukon XL I have to move the front passenger seat back to keep the seat from moving around, since there is no latch in the car for rear facing seats (although there is on the seat, so perhaps other cars have one).
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: We love this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: We have this car seat for our 18 month old that we got when she was 6 months and wanted another for our other vehicle. It’s the best car seat I’ve ever bought! Super quick ship too!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Always the best quality for Chicco!
customer_reviews.text: We have never used any other brand as we trust in quality and safety of the Chicco products. This is our 5th Chicco carseat and we love this one. The strap is so much easier to pull and get the kid snug in the seat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MeawTheCatz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this car seat pretty but the installation is so easy and it feels like it would be very comfortable. My daughter started to hate her carrier car seat so it was time to upgrade. Definitely happy I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat we have tried. Its a deep seat and fits my daughters height well. Easy install and fits nicely on recline 1 in my 07 Tahoe without causing issues with the driver seat. Wish we would have bought this seat from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat for my son and he actually enjoys car rides now. A little spendy but so worth it for the quality and easy installation. I definitely feel safer to have my son in this then the original car seat I got for my daughter I ended up getting the same one for her both love them. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Cali Graham

customer_reviews.title: The Kid's Sister is Still Around
customer_reviews.text: Bought two different models of this seat (see other review). This one was also well made and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite car seat of all time! I wish we’d had this sooner. Much nicer than either of our previous Britax car seats, and SO easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Comfort meets safety
customer_reviews.text: The anchor clamps (not sure if it’s just because of our Hyundai Elantra) aren’t long enough to be able to tilt the seat back to allow a position of comfort. Soft cushiony material makes for comfortable drive minus the clamp situation.
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn Drost

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this car seat for the following reasons: 1st its Way too big for small or medium size car 2nd is not as comfortable as they said supposed to be 3rd it's lock's the view from the kid while driving
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and easy to clean. Just unzip and throw in the washer. Well built and very sturdy. The color was more of a purple which was perfect for our princess. Shes 12 months and wanted to keep her rear facing as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Easy Install/Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this car seat! We upgraded from the Chicco KeyFit30 (which we also loved). SUPER easy to install, comfortable for baby and so easy to adjust for growth! We LOVE the strap tightening system (convenient yellow button by feet) which is a game-changer if you have every owned any other brand. The recline/adjust feature is so nice when we are on long trips, so our baby girl can recline while she sleeps. Thanks Chicco for another awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! One wish is it needs clips to keep the straps out of the way. That’s a minor complaint as it seems as though it would definitely keep my baby safe in an accident!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Yes this is the carseat you want !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, so pleased and thankful for the security and peace of mind that my baby is safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Renea D.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your family. Go Chicco
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Easy to install. Sturdy. Most important above all: product gives you peace of mind that your little on is protected. —-Chicco Family
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat !!!  but not a swap cars kind of seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat and comfortable !!! Very heavy and tedious to install so not for swapping vehicles a lot !
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My toddler threw up in it the first time he rode in it. It was so easy to clean up! It also looks pretty comfy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Chicco!
customer_reviews.text: Chicco is the ONLY car seat my kids use! Super easy to install & super durable. They are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cole

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for our baby
customer_reviews.text: There are so many to decide between. We love this one, especially for easy clean ups (after an unexpected blowout) and comfort for long road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

product_meta.title: Chicco NextFit Sport Convertible Car Seat, Black
product_meta.description: Style:NextFit Sport| Color:BlackThe #1-rated Chicco NextFit Sport Convertible Car Seat is engineered to surround your little one in comfort and safety, all the way to preschool and beyond. Reassuringly easy installation and user-friendly touchpoints simplify travel and everyday life, making it easier for families to go and grow together. The NextFit Sport accommodates infants and growing toddlers in rear-facing mode then transitions smoothly to forward-facing mode for older children. A nine-position headrest and padded, no-rethread harness comfortably accommodate growth throughout both modes. The NextFit Sport is designed to deliver the confidence of a secure install with remarkably simple leveling and tightening. A SuperCinch force-multiplying tightener and LockSure belt-tightening system make it easy to achieve a tight fit with LATCH or with the vehicle seat belt. The NextFit Sport also transitions smoothly from vehicle to vehicle and between modes thanks to premium LATCH connectors with click-on attachment and push-button release, plus a built-in slide path to re-position the LATCH strap for forward-facing mode. DuoGuard provides two layers of side-impact protection with a deep rigid shell and EPS energy-absorbing foam. The seat shell is also reinforced with a steel frame. For use from 12-40 lbs in rear-facing mode, from 22-65 lbs in forward-facing mode, and up to 49".
feature_bullets: Remarkably easy installation with a 9-position ReclineSure leveling system, SuperCinch LATCH Tightener, and LockSure seat belt tightening system
Superior DuoGuard protection with a deep rigid shell and EPS energy-absorbing foam, plus a steel-reinforced frame
Accommodates growing children with a padded no-rethread harness, 9-position headrest, and easy transition from rear-facing to forward-facing
Padding is soft, removable, and machine-washable for comfort and convenience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars870 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
